guide.summary: This screencast will guide you through how to input the proper equations necessary to construct a Log C vs pH diagram.  The monoprotic acid will be in a closed system and the diprotic acid will be in an open system, enjoy!
guide.title: How to Construct a Log C vs pH diagram (diprotic and monoprotic acid)
